channel.title: Corey Mylchreest on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Corey Mylchreest on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How ‘My Oxford Year’ Brings a Fresh Spin to Love and Loss
item.description: Director Iain Morris chats with The Hollywood Reporter about depicting a “sick lit” story rooted in laughter and hope: “I really hope for everyone to be devastated, but at the same time hopeful.”

item.title: How ‘My Oxford Year’ Brings a Fresh Spin to Love and Loss
item.description: Director Iain Morris chats with The Hollywood Reporter about depicting a “sick lit” story rooted in laughter and hope: “I really hope for everyone to be devastated, but at the same time hopeful.”

item.title: ‘My Oxford Year’ Star Corey Mylchreest Breaks Down that Karaoke Scene and Talks Jaime’s Big Choice
item.description: The actor details feeling conflicted over his character’s key life decision in the film: “I really tried to meditate on that for a very long time.”

item.title: ‘My Oxford Year’ Star Corey Mylchreest Breaks Down that Karaoke Scene and Talks Jaime’s Big Choice
item.description: The actor details feeling conflicted over his character’s key life decision in the film: “I really tried to meditate on that for a very long time.”

item.title: Sofia Carson Is Ready to Offer a “Classic Timeless Love Story” With ’My Oxford Year’
item.description: The actress talks with THR about bringing the bestselling book to life onscreen and that heartbreaking yet hopeful ending.

item.title: Sofia Carson Is Ready to Offer a “Classic Timeless Love Story” With ’My Oxford Year’
